name: Cetaphil Clensing Lotion
description: Cetaphil cleansing lotion is a non-soap and liquid free lotion that allows gentle and thorough cleansing without the irritation associated with harsh soaps and cleansers. Cetaphil cleansing lotion is fragrance free and non comedogenic. It has emollient properties, which leave the cleansed skin soft and supple. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
